message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me. Let me know what you think!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm looking for a price closer to my initial offer. I'm willing to go down to $11,200. This is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Hi Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $10,900 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise. Let me know what you think!
